localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Writing your negative thoughts down on a piece of paper and then discarding them can help you find peace. Thought Detox brings this experience to your iPhone, letting you write out your thoughts and then release them — without storing or sending them anywhere.
blogPost.body: Writing your negative thoughts down on a piece of paper and then discarding them can help you find peace. Thought Detox brings this experience to your iPhone, letting you write out your thoughts and then release them — without storing or sending them anywhere.
blogPost.title: Thought Detox - Private notes to clear your mind
blogPost.author: Angelo Stavrow

localize.description: 将你的负面想法写在纸上，然后丢弃，可以帮助你找到平静。Thought Detox将这种体验带到你的iPhone上，让你写出你的想法，然后释放它们--无需存储或发送它们到任何地方。
localize.tagline: 私人笔记，让你头脑清醒

localize.description: 將你的負面想法寫在紙上，然後丟棄，可以幫助你找到平靜。Thought Detox將這種體驗帶到你的iPhone上，讓你寫出你的想法，然後釋放它們--無需存儲或發送它們到任何地方。
localize.tagline: 私人筆記，讓你頭腦清醒
